info.title: OpenAPI Eigen Explorer
info.description: Api reference for the Eigen Explorer

get.summary: Retrieve summary metrics
get.description: Returns summary metrics, including TVLs for both restaking strategies and the Beacon Chain ETH strategy, as well as the total number of AVS, operators, and stakers.

tvlBeaconChain.description: The total value locked (TVL) in ETH in the beacon chain ETH strategy

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

tvlStrategies.description: The total value locked (TVL) in each restaking strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

totalOperators.description: The total number of AVS operators

totalStakers.description: The total number of AVS stakers

get.summary: Retrieve total TVL
get.description: Returns the total value locked (TVL) in all restaking strategies and Beacon Chain restaking.

200.description: The value of the combined TVL in ETH.

tvlBeaconChain.description: The total value locked (TVL) in ETH in the beacon chain ETH strategy

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

tvlStrategies.description: The total value locked (TVL) in each restaking strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

get.summary: Retrieve a strategy TVL by name
get.description: Returns the total value locked (TVL) in a specific LST strategy.

strategyName.description: The name of the restaking strategy

200.description: The value of combined restaking strategy TVL and a breakdown of the TVL for each individual strategy.

tvl.description: The value of the restaking strategy TVL, denominated in the strategy's native token

get.summary: Retrieve total number of AVS
get.description: Returns the total number of AVS registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS registered.

total.description: The total number of AVS registered

get.summary: Retrieve total number of AVS operators
get.description: Returns the total number of AVS operators registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS operators registered.

total.description: The total number of AVS operators registered

get.summary: Retrieve total number of AVS stakers
get.description: Returns the total number of AVS stakers registered.

200.description: The total number of AVS stakers registered.

total.description: The total number of AVS stakers registered

get.summary: Retrieve total number of withdrawals
get.description: Returns the total number of withdrawals.

get.summary: Retrieve total number of deposits
get.description: Returns the total number of deposits.

get.summary: Retrieve all stakers
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of all stakers with their operator assignments and share distributions across strategies.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records per page

operatorAddress.description: The operator's address that this staker is delegating to

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the staker was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the staker was last updated

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the staker was created

updatedAtBlock.description: Block number when the staker was last updated

shares.description: Number of shares in the strategy
Array of strategy shares held by the staker

get.summary: Retrieve staker details for a specific address
get.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific staker including their operator assignment and share distributions across strategies.

operatorAddress.description: The operator's address that this staker is delegating to

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the staker was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the staker was last updated

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the staker was created

updatedAtBlock.description: Block number when the staker was last updated

shares.description: Number of shares in the strategy
Array of strategy shares held by the staker

404.description: Not Found - Staker address does not exist

get.summary: Retrieve all withdrawals for a specific staker
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of withdrawal records for a specific staker, including completed and pending withdrawals.

schema.description: The number of records per page

withdrawalRoot.description: The unique identifier for this withdrawal

delegatedTo.description: The operator address this withdrawal is delegated to

withdrawerAddress.description: The address that can complete this withdrawal

shares.description: Number of shares being withdrawn
Array of strategy shares being withdrawn

isCompleted.description: Whether the withdrawal has been completed

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was last updated

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was created

updatedAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was last updated

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing staker address

get.summary: Retrieve completed withdrawals for a specific staker
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of completed withdrawal records for a specific staker.

schema.description: The number of records per page

withdrawalRoot.description: The unique identifier for this withdrawal

delegatedTo.description: The operator address this withdrawal was delegated to

withdrawerAddress.description: The address that completed this withdrawal

shares.description: Number of shares withdrawn
Array of strategy shares that were withdrawn

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was completed

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was created

updatedAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was completed

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing staker address

example: Failed to fetch staker completed withdrawals

get.summary: Retrieve deposits for a specific staker
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of deposit records for a specific staker.

schema.description: The number of records per page

tokenAddress.description: The address of the deposited token

strategyAddress.description: The address of the strategy contract

shares.description: Number of shares received for the deposit

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the deposit was created

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the deposit was created

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing staker address

get.summary: Retrieve queued withdrawals for a specific staker
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of pending (non-completed) withdrawal records for a specific staker.

schema.description: The number of records per page

withdrawalRoot.description: The unique identifier for this withdrawal

delegatedTo.description: The operator address this withdrawal is delegated to

withdrawerAddress.description: The address that can complete this withdrawal

shares.description: Number of shares being withdrawn
Array of strategy shares being withdrawn

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was created

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was created

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing staker address

example: Failed to fetch staker queued withdrawals

get.summary: Retrieve all registered AVS
get.description: Returns all AVS records. Pagination Enabled.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records per page

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS's X

metadataURI.description: The URI of the AVS metadata

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers staking in the AVS

totalOperators.description: The total number of operators operating the AVS

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS was created

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS was last updated

createdAt.description: The timestamp at which the AVS was created

updatedAt.description: The timestamp at which the AVS was last updated

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The strategy shares held in the AVS

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.summary: Retrieve all AVS addresses
get.description: Returns a list of all AVS addresses. Pagination Enabled.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records per page

uri.description: The metadata URI of the AVS

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.summary: Retrieve an AVS details for a specific address
get.description: Returns a single AVS record by address.

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers staking in the AVS

totalActiveOperators.description: The total number of active operators in the AVS

totalRegisteredOperators.description: The total number of registered operators in the AVS

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS was created

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS was last updated

createdAt.description: The timestamp at which the AVS was created

updatedAt.description: The timestamp at which the AVS was last updated

metadataDescription.example: EigenDA is a data availability solution with 10 MiB/s of write throughput and the lowest cost in its class.

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS's X (formerly Twitter) account

metadataGithub.description: The GitHub URL for the AVS

metadataTokenAddress.description: The token address associated with the AVS

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

underlygingToken.description: The underlying token address of the strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The strategy shares held in the AVS

get.summary: Retrieve all stakers for a specific AVS address
get.description: Returns all stakers for a specific AVS address. Pagination Enabled.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records per page

200.description: The stakers record found for the AVS.

address.description: The contract address of the staker

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the Staker made first delegation

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the Staker made last delegation

createdAt.description: The timestamp at which the Staker made first delegation

updatedAt.description: The timestamp at which the Staker made last delegation

strategy.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.summary: Retrieve all operators for a given AVS address
get.description: Returns all operators for a given AVS address. Pagination Enabled.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records per page

200.description: The operators record found for the AVS.

address.description: The contract address of the AVS operator

metadataDescription.example: Build and scale faster with simple, secure tools and infrastructure for Web3.

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS's X

metadataURI.description: The URI of the AVS metadata

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS Operator was registered

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS Operator registration was last updated

createdAt.description: The timestamp at which the AVS Operator was registered

updatedAt.description: The timestamp at which the AVS Operator registration was last updated

strategy.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers who have delegated to this AVS operator

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current query

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.summary: Retrieve all deposits
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of all deposit records across all stakers, ordered by creation time in descending order.

schema.description: The number of records per page

stakerAddress.description: The address of the staker who made the deposit

tokenAddress.description: The address of the deposited token

strategyAddress.description: The address of the strategy contract

shares.description: Number of shares received for the deposit

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the deposit was created

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the deposit was created

get.summary: Retrieve all withdrawals
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of all withdrawal records across all stakers, including both completed and pending withdrawals, ordered by creation time in descending order.

schema.description: The number of records per page

withdrawalRoot.description: The unique identifier for this withdrawal

delegatedTo.description: The operator address this withdrawal is delegated to

withdrawerAddress.description: The address that can complete this withdrawal

shares.description: Number of shares being withdrawn
Array of strategy shares being withdrawn

isCompleted.description: Whether the withdrawal has been completed

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was last updated

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was created

updatedAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was last updated

get.summary: Retrieve withdrawal details by withdrawal root
get.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific withdrawal using its withdrawal root identifier.

withdrawalRoot.description: The unique identifier for this withdrawal

delegatedTo.description: The operator address this withdrawal is delegated to

withdrawerAddress.description: The address that can complete this withdrawal

shares.description: Number of shares being withdrawn
Array of strategy shares being withdrawn

isCompleted.description: Whether the withdrawal has been completed

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the withdrawal was last updated

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was created

updatedAtBlock.description: Block number when the withdrawal was last updated

404.description: Not Found - Withdrawal root does not exist

get.summary: Retrieve all operators
get.description: Fetches all operator records with pagination support. Use query parameters to specify page number and limit.

schema.description: The number of records per page

address.description: The contract address of the AVS operator

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS's X

metadataURI.description: The URI of the AVS metadata

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers who have delegated to this AVS operator

totalAvs.description: The total number of AVS opted by the AVS operator

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS Operator was registered

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS Operator registration was last updated

createdAt.description: The time stamp at which the AVS Operator was registered

updatedAt.description: The time stamp at which the AVS Operator registration was last updated

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The strategy shares held in the AVS operator

isActive.description: True indicates operator is an active participant while False indicates it used to be one but not anymore

avsRegistrations.description: Operator AVS registrations and their participation status

tvlBeaconChain.description: The TVL of Beacon Chain restaking strategy in ETH

tvlWETH.description: The TVL of WETH restaking strategy in ETH

additionalProperties.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the strategy, denominated in the strategy's native token

tvlStrategies.description: The TVL of each individual restaking strategy in its native token

tvl.description: The total value locked (TVL) in the AVS operator

total.description: Total number of records in the database

page.description: The page number of the current response

limit.description: The number of records returned for this query

get.summary: Retrieve operator details for a specific address
get.description: Returns an operator record by address.

schema.description: The number of records per page

200.description: The record of the requested operator.

address.description: The contract address of the AVS operator

metadataDiscord.description: The URL of the AVS's Discord server

metadataLogo.description: The URL of the AVS's logo

metadataTelegram.description: The URL of the AVS's Telegram channel

metadataWebsite.description: The URL of the AVS's website

metadataX.description: The URL of the AVS's X

metadataURI.description: The URI of the AVS metadata

totalStakers.description: The total number of stakers who have delegated to this AVS operator

totalAvs.description: The total number of AVS opted by the AVS operator

createdAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS Operator was registered

updatedAtBlock.description: The block number at which the AVS Operator registration was last updated

createdAt.description: The time stamp at which the AVS Operator was registered

updatedAt.description: The time stamp at which the AVS Operator registration was last updated

strategyAddress.description: The contract address of the restaking strategy

shares.description: The amount of shares held in the strategy
The strategy shares held in the AVS operator

isActive.description: True indicates operator is an active participant while False indicates it used to be one but not anymore

avsRegistrations.description: Operator AVS registrations and their participation status

get.summary: Retrieve all operator addresses with basic metadata
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of operator addresses along with their names and logos.

schema.description: The number of records per page

address.description: The contract address of the operator

logo.description: The URL of the operator's logo

total.description: Total number of operators in the database

get.summary: Retrieve all stakers for a specific operator
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of stakers who have delegated to a specific operator, including their shares across different strategies.

schema.description: The number of records per page

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the staker was created

updatedAtBlock.description: Block number when the staker was last updated

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the staker was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the staker was last updated

shares.description: Number of shares in the strategy
Array of staker shares across different strategies

total.description: Total number of stakers for this operator

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing operator address

get.summary: Retrieve staking history for a specific operator
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of historical staking actions (restaking events) associated with a specific operator.

schema.description: The number of records per page

shares.description: Number of shares
Array of strategy shares involved in the action

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the action was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the action was last updated

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the action was created

updatedAtBlock.description: Block number when the action was last updated

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing operator address

example: Failed to fetch operator staker history

get.summary: Retrieve AVS history for a specific operator
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of historical AVS-related events for a specific operator, ordered by block number in descending order.

schema.description: The number of records per page

createdAtBlock.description: Block number when the event occurred

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing operator address

The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

401.description: Although the HTTP standard specifies "unauthorized", semantically this response means "unauthenticated". That is, the client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

403.description: The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource. Unlike 401 Unauthorized, the client's identity is known to the server.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

422.description: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

429.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time ("rate limiting")

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.
message.example: The requested resource was not found.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code
